name: brigade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a large group of soldiers in an army
[ C usually singular ] informal a group of people who have something in common, especially an enthusiasm for a particular belief or subject: Since she gave up smoking she's joined the anti-smoking brigade.
